notify.privateMessageDesc: Notify me when someone sends a message to my inbox.
notify.mentionDesc: Notify me when someone mentions me on a thread.
notify.watchedTopicDesc: Notify me when a watched topic gets new replies.

security.deleteWarning: This will permanently delete your account
security.emailChangeWarning: By changing your email you will no longer recieve notifications to your older email. Please make sure you will not use this email anymore before changing it
security.riskyPassword: This password is very weak and easily guessable.
security.weakPassword: This password is weak. It will protect you from throttled online attacks.
security.normalPassword: This password is normal. It will protect you from unthrottled online attacks.
security.strongPassword: This password is secure. It will protect you from an offline slow-hash scenario.
security.veryStrongPassword: This password is very secure. It will strongly protect you from an offline slow-hash scenario.
